A1.value: Tax Reduction, Credit and Deductible Allowances

A5.value: Tax Reduction for Full Time Teacher / Researcher (Except teachers of medical professions who derive income from private medical practice)

D5.formula: IF((ISERROR(IF(B5="Y",(('Tax Computation'!B6*('Tax Computation'!B16+'Tax Computation'!B17)/'Tax Computation'!B9)*25%),0))),0,IF(B5="Y",(('Tax Computation'!B6*('Tax Computation'!B16+'Tax Computation'!B17)/'Tax Computation'!B9)*25%),0))

E5.value: 25% of tax payable on his income from salary

A6.value: Tax Reduction on Tax Charged on Behbood Certificates / Pensioner's Benefit Account in excess of applicable rate

E6.value: Tax shall not exceed 5% of such profit

H6.value: Certificate amount and applicable tax to be input in green cells

A7.value: Tax Reduction on Capital Gain on Immovable Property under clause (9A), Part III, Second Schedule for Ex-Servicemen and serving personnel of Armed Forces and ex-employees and serving personnel of Federal & Provincial Government @50%

E7.value: 50% of the normal tax on capital gain

H7.value: Green cells are to be filled in

A8.value: Tax Reduction on Capital Gain on Immovable Property under clause (9A), Part III, Second Schedule for Ex-Servicemen and serving personnel of Armed Forces and ex-employees and serving personnel of Federal & Provincial Government @75%

E8.value: 75% of the normal tax on capital gain

H8.value: Green cells are to be filled in

A12.value: Tax Credit for Charitable Donations u/s 61

D12.formula: IF(ISERROR((MIN(C12,'Tax Computation'!B13*30%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,(MIN(C12,'Tax Computation'!B13*30%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13)

H12.value: Green cells are to be filled in and tax credit is computed as per TY2025 rates

A13.value: Tax Credit for Charitable Donations u/s 61 where donation is made to associate

D13.formula: IF(ISERROR((MIN(C13,'Tax Computation'!B13*15%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,(MIN(C13,'Tax Computation'!B13*15%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13)

A14.value: Tax Credit for Contribution to Approved Pension Fund u/s 63

D14.formula: IF(ISERROR((MIN(C14,'Tax Computation'!B13*G14))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,((MIN(C14,'Tax Computation'!B13*G14))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13))

E14.value: 20% of the taxable income (2% per year for above 40 years if he joined at or above 41 years of age)

F14.value: Applicable tax credit rate based on age

A15.value: Surrender of Tax Credit on Investments in Shares disposed off before time limit

A19.value: Educational expense of children (U/S 60D) available to taxpayer with taxable income not exceeding Rs 1.5m per year (5% of the amount paid OR 25% of taxable income OR Rs 60k per child whichever is lower)

C19.formula: IF(ISERROR(MIN((F19*5%),('Tax Computation'!B9*25%),( 60000*'Tax Reduction, Credit & deduct '!F20))),0,(MIN((F19*5%),('Tax Computation'!B9*25%),( 60000*'Tax Reduction, Credit & deduct '!F20))))

E20.value: No. of Children for whom tuition fee is paid

A21.value: Zakat paid under Zakat and Usher Ordinance

G21.value: Input cell (the value used in computation of taxable income

A26.value: Special straight deduction is available forZakatpaid under the Zakat and Usher Ordinance.

A27.value: A rebate at the average rate of tax is allowed on donations made to any approved non-profit organisationon the lower of donation value and 30% of the individuals taxable income. In case of donations made by an individual to an associate, the amount of donations qualifying for tax credit would be restricted to 15% of the individuals taxable income.

A28.value: Donations to certain approved institutes that were earlier eligible for direct deduction from income have now been transposed into the tax credit regime. As a result, the overall upper limit for tax break for the donors, in respect of charitable donations, has been reduced.

formulas.formula: IF((ISERROR(IF(B5="Y",(('Tax Computation'!B6*('Tax Computation'!B16+'Tax Computation'!B17)/'Tax Computation'!B9)*25%),0))),0,IF(B5="Y",(('Tax Computation'!B6*('Tax Computation'!B16+'Tax Computation'!B17)/'Tax Computation'!B9)*25%),0))
IF(ISERROR((MIN(C12,'Tax Computation'!B13*30%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,(MIN(C12,'Tax Computation'!B13*30%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13)
IF(ISERROR((MIN(C13,'Tax Computation'!B13*15%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,(MIN(C13,'Tax Computation'!B13*15%))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13)
IF(ISERROR((MIN(C14,'Tax Computation'!B13*G14))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13),0,((MIN(C14,'Tax Computation'!B13*G14))*'Tax Computation'!B19/'Tax Computation'!B13))
IF(ISERROR(MIN((F19*5%),('Tax Computation'!B9*25%),( 60000*'Tax Reduction, Credit & deduct '!F20))),0,(MIN((F19*5%),('Tax Computation'!B9*25%),( 60000*'Tax Reduction, Credit & deduct '!F20))))
